metadata.name: Earmarking Category
metadata.description: This codelist has been created by IATI and is derived from the Grand Bargain Earmarking Modality codelist.

data.name: Unearmarked
data.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes A,B or C.

data.name: Softly Earmarked
data.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes D,E or F.

data.name: Earmarked
data.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes G or H.

data.name: Tightly Earmarked
data.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes I,J or K.
